answers.answer: Aw, darkie---you poor thing!!  I have the "bleahs" and some mild nausea, but nothin' like that.  Are you swelling?  Putting on weight abnormally fast?When you say bad and don't know how to explain it, is it just "i just feel friggin awful" in general with bleah and mild nausea and heartburn and general ickiness?  That i have felt.  I have MASSIVE heartburn issues just like i did with my son.  But i'm worried about your high blood pressure... how elevated is it?
I hope you start to feel better sweetie!

See my bp goes upppp and then down... and tonight i started swelling in my hands badly. I can't get my ring off what so ever. I'm starting to worry now too. ugh. My BP is still high no matter what for me. In the beginning it stayed 100/60 now it ranges from 125/85 - 148/99. When I went into L & D a wk ago it was as high as 169/88, but they got it down. So I don't know what to do. If you have preeclampsia does your BP constantly stay high?

Dkl- I have noticed my appetite had diminished. Nothing is settling right I can't explain it but I have absoulutely room in my stomach at all. I'm all baby so I'm wondering where my stomach is now. Omg time girls for new belly pics. Let's have a contest to see who has the biggest belly....WE should start a poll! What do you think?I hope we all feel better soon.......APDkl- im or text me later!!!!(hugs)

I'm so sorry you are feeling bad!  I hope you feel better soon!  I'm worried about your BP and the sudden swelling in your hands - I am NO expert as I am a first timer, but sudden swelling in the hands is on a list that my Dr. gave me for things to call him immediately about.  Have you talked to your Dr.?
Ps I have the starts of carpal tunnel it's a pain in the but! I would def find out what is going on with you.AP

UGHHH!  Talk about wanting to BARF!  I am right there with you today girl!  Don't know what's going on with me...it all started this morning.  Just been feeling like I need to run to the bathroom every five minutes and then nothing happens.  YUCK!  I thought this part was over when I got past the first trimester.

question: OMG as the third trimester closes in on us, in fact my fundal height is already that of the 3rd trimester. I just want to barf all the time, i feel bad but don't know how to explain it.I read that nausea and throwing up is a sign of preeclampsia and i have a few other symptoms too like the high blood pressure, but they havent done a 24 hr urine yet. I feel so GD bad.
title: I want to BARF! Sry TMI
